document_data.name: Krynn
document_data.mainbody: '''Krynn''' was the third and most populous of the planets of [[Krynnspace]].

Cosmology.Calendar: Much like the [[Calendar of Harptos]], the major calendar used by the people of this world had 365 days divided into 12 months, though it also had an additional leap day. Because of this, the months on Krynn's calendar had either 30 or 31 days apiece. and had its months based on a lunar cycle of 28-days.

document_data.History:
Throughout Krynn's history, much like [[Mystara]] and Oerth, its astronomical and astrological records commonly featured phenomena that were caused by either magic or deities.

In the midâ€’14{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Denys of Shiningburg]] and [[Dav the Butcher]] were sent as emissaries from Krynn to the [[Rock of Bral]] to discuss the threat of invasion the [[Vodoni Empire]] posed to the [[crystal sphere]]s of [[Realmspace]], [[Greyspace]], and Krynnspace, in the early stages of the [[War of the Spheres]]. The meeting marked the formation of the [[Free Space Alliance]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends:
Rumors existed of a ''[[gate]]'' connecting the northern region of [[The Sword]] in [[Anauroch]] on [[Toril]] to an unspecified location on Krynn. This rumor was due to [[adventurer]]s on Toril reported encounters in that region with a variety of creatures that were native to Krynn. These included [[hatori]], [[horax]], [[skrit]]s, and [[tylor]]s.

There was an ancient tale from Krynn that spoke of a horrific bat-like creature from the sky that caused immense destruction. These legends indicated that the ''[[Batship]]'' passed through Krynnspace on its journey to Realmspace.
